title: Suggestion: Make game modes like URF available Friday-Monday, instead of weekend only.
body:
Many people who play LoL don't have time to play on weekends, due to work, family commitments, sport, and so on. Students in particular tend to work all weekend and have more time during the week for games. 

If you make the game modes available for people to play on Friday, through the weekend until Monday night, it'd fix this issue for these people. Is there a cost of keeping the game modes running? Could it be offset by the satisfaction of these players?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This thread would be better suited for the [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) or [GD](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion) boards where you may have a better chance of sparking discussion.

This board is for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.
